title: Chaos Elemental

fields.name: Tides of Chaos:
fields.value: Each night, you MUST target a player. You will perform a random, non-locked action that starts with at least 1 ammo, from a random role in <#1171611618388488202>, on that player. If you scored above 50%, you may choose the alignment that the role comes from. If you scored above 70% or placed in the top 3, you may choose both the alignment and subalignment that the role comes from.

fields.name: It's All Madness!:
fields.value: (x0, Charge 200%): Use this ability during the Evening. You may choose as many players as you wish. All of the players you select will be forced to use Tides of Chaos the next Night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game!

desc:
Post 148
*I can do anything!* (Concept taken from Gamma's Pixel Dungeon Mafia)
